title: RILWAN
author: RILWAN
content: Is there already a thread where this topic is already discussed, I want us to discuss everything related to current clubs' transfer against the next round. As we are aware most clubs are currently signing new contracts, what do you think about all of that, and what are the expectations of football fans. Let's hear your personal views and predictions.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: There is a thread already existing about football transfer discussion: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1877785.0The thread is already long though and new thread should be better which would be better to be proposed next year as I think about it, but as of the present opened transfer window, their are discussion concerning that existing on that thread already and a new thread is not needed this time, but probably until after next season is over, though if there is any need to create new thread about it.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Just like you have been advised, there is already an existing thread on transfer discussion and is included in the reply above so you should do well by locking this thread now and wait till the start of next season before we start another player transfer although transfer windows are presently open and discussion is already going on on that thread. Anyways the attention of the moderator has been called to lock this thread to avoid spamming the board with repeated discussion and double thread existence.

comments.author: RILWAN
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on June 14, 2022, 08:24:44 PMThere is a thread already existing about football transfer discussion: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1877785.0The thread is already long though and new thread should be better which would be better to be proposed next year as I think about it, but as of the present opened transfer window, their are discussion concerning that existing on that thread already and a new thread is not needed this time, but probably until after next season is over, though if there is any need to create new thread about it.OK thank you for the suggestion to the discussion link, I will follow up with a discussion on that thread, and an going ahead to lock this thread now thank you for all the replies.
